entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Medicine Hat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:43 AM MDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Medicine Hat Airport 09:31 AM MDT Monday 20 March 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -7.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:37 AM MDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 07:37 AM MDT Monday 20 March 2023
